meanings.definition: A physical altercation involving the use of fists.
meanings.sent1: The two boys got into fistfights after school.
meanings.sent2: Fistfights can lead to injuries if not stopped early.
meanings.sent3: During the movie, the characters had comical fistfights over trivial matters.
meanings.sent4: In the world of politics, debates can sometimes turn into verbal fistfights.
meanings.sent5: The image of the two boxers in the ring captured the essence of intense fistfights.

meanings.definition: To engage in a physical fight using only one's fists.
meanings.sent1: He fistfights with his brother whenever they disagree.
meanings.sent2: People should not fistfight to resolve their differences.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys playfully fistfight over the last banana in the bunch.
meanings.sent4: In the game, players fistfight to win the virtual battle.
meanings.sent5: The superheroes fistfight the villains to protect the city from harm.
